scripts.compile: browserify src/index.js -o dist/chillout.js -s chillout -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -p [ bannerify --file src/banner.js ] --no-bundle-external --bare
scripts.watch: watchify src/index.js -o dist/chillout.js -s chillout -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -p [ bannerify --file src/banner.js ] --no-bundle-external --bare --poll=200 -v
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run minify
scripts.test: npm run build && mocha test/test-node && karma start karma.conf.js
scripts.travis: npm run build && mocha test/test-node && karma start karma.conf.js --single-run
